div.p: Apply below to be considered for potential business with RDP.

div.t-attf-class: mb-3 #{error and error.get('state_id') and 'o_has_error' or ''} col-xl-6

select.name: state_id
select.t-attf-class: form-control form-select #{error and error.get('state_id') and 'is-invalid' or ''}

option.t-att-selected: state.id == int(state_id) if state_id else state.id == partner.state_id.id

div.t-attf-class: mb-3 #{error and error.get('state_id') and 'o_has_error' or ''} col-xl-6

select.name: state_id
select.t-attf-class: form-control form-select #{error and error.get('state_id') and 'is-invalid' or ''}

option.t-att-selected: state.id == int(state_id) if state_id else state.id == partner.state_id.id

div.t-attf-class: mb-3 #{error and error.get('country_id') and 'o_has_error' or ''} col-xl-6

select.name: country_id
select.t-attf-class: form-control form-select #{error and error.get('country_id') and 'is-invalid' or ''}

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id

div.t-attf-class: mb-3 #{error and error.get('country_id') and 'o_has_error' or ''} col-xl-6

select.name: country_id
select.t-attf-class: form-control form-select #{error and error.get('country_id') and 'is-invalid' or ''}

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id

div.strong:
We have successfully create a your vendor request.
Thank you,

div.p: Apply below to be considered for potential business with RDP.

section.p: Apply below to be considered for potential business with RDP.

input.name: vat
input.title: GST Identification Number is not valid. It should be in this 36AAFCR6499A1Z6 format
